name: Developer Roadmap Plugin
description: Comprehensive learning and career development plugin with 81 roadmaps across 7 specialized agent categories, covering 25 roles, 14 languages, 17 frameworks, and 10+ infrastructure technologies
author: Claude Code Official

agents.name: Foundation & Core Technologies
agents.description: Programming languages, algorithms, data structures, and CS fundamentals

agents.name: Frontend & UI Development
agents.description: Frontend frameworks, UI/UX design, responsive design, and modern web development

agents.name: Backend & API Development
agents.description: Backend frameworks, API design, microservices, and server-side technologies

agents.name: DevOps & Cloud Infrastructure
agents.description: Cloud platforms, containerization, orchestration, and infrastructure automation

agents.name: Data & AI/ML Engineering
agents.description: Data engineering, machine learning, AI, analytics, and data science

agents.name: Architecture & Design Patterns
agents.description: System design, architectural patterns, software design principles, and scalability

agents.name: Specializations & Advanced Roles
agents.description: Management, blockchain, gaming, security, specialized databases, and niche technologies

commands.name: learn
commands.description: Start your learning journey with personalized roadmap selection

commands.name: browse
commands.description: Explore all 81 roadmaps across 7 agent categories

commands.name: assess
commands.description: Evaluate your current knowledge and get personalized learning paths

commands.name: compare
commands.description: Compare different roadmaps and career paths side-by-side

commands.name: projects
commands.description: Explore 100+ hands-on projects aligned with each roadmap
